p: EPA occurs in large amounts in herring (15% of total lipids) [ 59], wild sardine (13.6% of muscle total FAs) [ 61] and pollock roe (18.8%) [ 59]. In plants, it is rather rare. Mention should be made of Undaria pinnatifida (13% of essential oil composition) [ 107] and Rhododendron sochadzeae (2% of leaf FA hexan extract) [ 108].
